TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit WebEventBufferFlushInfo extends System.Object

summary.span: 包含定義清除緩衝區特性的參數。

span.span: Contains the parameters defining the flush buffer characteristics.

remarks.format: ## Remarks ASP.NET 健康監視，可讓生產環境和作業人員管理已部署的 Web 應用程式。ASP.NET health monitoring allows production and operations staff to manage deployed Web applications. 命名空間包含負責封裝應用程式健全狀況狀態資料和負責處理此資料提供者類型的健康情況事件型別。The namespace contains the health-event types responsible for packaging application health-status data and the provider types responsible for processing this data. 它也會包含有助於管理健全狀況事件的支援型別。It also contains supporting types that help during the management of health events. 類別會定義識別緩衝區的目前狀態的值。The class defines values that identify the buffer's current status. 類別的執行個體當做參數傳遞給方法，以處理已緩衝的訊息。An instance of the class is passed as a parameter to the method that processes the messages that have been buffered. 需要排清緩衝區時，ASP.NET 健康監視呼叫這個方法。ASP.NET health monitoring calls this method when the flushing of the buffer is required. 這取決於所定義的參數`bufferModes`中的項目`healthMonitoring`組態區段。This is determined by the parameters defined by the `bufferModes` element in the `healthMonitoring` configuration section. > [!NOTE] > 根據設計，緩衝機制可能會卸除部分事件，才能跟上內送事件。By design, the buffering mechanism might drop some events in order to keep pace with the incoming events. 是由使用者調整這項機制，藉由適當地修改`bufferModes`中的項目`healthMonitoring`組態區段。It is up to the user to adjust this mechanism by properly modifying the `bufferModes` element in the `healthMonitoring` configuration section. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用 類別。The following code example shows how to use the class. 此程式碼範例是針對提供之較大範例的一部分類別。This code example is part of a larger example provided for the class. [!code-csharp[System.Web.Management.BufferedWebEventProvider#6](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Management.BufferedWebEventProvider/CS/bufferedwebeventprovider.cs#6)] [!code-vb[System.Web.Management.BufferedWebEventProvider#6](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Management.BufferedWebEventProvider/VB/bufferedwebeventprovider.vb#6)]

Attribute.AttributeName: get: System.Runtime.TargetedPatchingOptOut("Performance critical to inline this type of method across NGen image boundaries")

summary.span: 取得目前訊息的事件集合。

span.span: Gets the events collection in the current message.

value.span: 目前訊息包含的 事件。

span.span: The events contained in the current message.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 由於緩衝處理，多個事件通常會傳送單一訊息中。Due to buffering, several events are usually sent in a single message. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用 屬性。The following code example shows how to use the property. 此程式碼範例是針對提供之較大範例的一部分類別。This code example is part of a larger example provided for the class. [!code-csharp[System.Web.Management.BufferedWebEventProvider#11](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Management.BufferedWebEventProvider/CS/bufferedwebeventprovider.cs#11)] [!code-vb[System.Web.Management.BufferedWebEventProvider#11](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Management.BufferedWebEventProvider/VB/bufferedwebeventprovider.vb#11)]

public: property int EventsDiscardedSinceLastNotification { int get(); };

Attribute.AttributeName: get: System.Runtime.TargetedPatchingOptOut("Performance critical to inline this type of method across NGen image boundaries")

summary.span: 取得上次告知以來卸除的事件數目。

span.span: Gets the number of events dropped since the last notification.

value.span: 上次告知以來緩衝機制卸除的事件數目。

span.span: The number of events dropped by the buffering mechanism since the last notification.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 根據設計，緩衝機制可能會卸除部分事件，才能跟上內送事件。By design, the buffering mechanism might drop some events in order to keep pace with the incoming events. 是由使用者調整這項機制，藉由適當地修改`bufferModes`中的項目`healthMonitoring`組態區段。It is up to the user to adjust this mechanism by properly modifying the `bufferModes` element in the `healthMonitoring` configuration section. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用 屬性。The following code example shows how to use the property. 此程式碼範例是針對提供之較大範例的一部分類別。This code example is part of a larger example provided for the class. summary.span: 取得緩衝區中的事件數目。

span.span: Gets the number of events in the buffer.
The number of events in the buffer.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個數字會擷取通知的開頭。This number is captured at the beginning of the notification. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用 屬性。The following code example shows how to use the property. 此程式碼範例是針對提供之較大範例的一部分類別。This code example is part of a larger example provided for the class.
